## Pull Request Title
Provide a clear and concise title for your PR.  
*Example: Add Treesitter plugin configuration*

---

## Description
Explain what this PR does and why it is needed.  
*Example: Added Treesitter plugin configuration to improve syntax highlighting.*

---

## Checklist
- [ ] I have tested my changes locally
- [ ] My code follows the project style guidelines
- [ ] I updated documentation if necessary
- [ ] This PR is linked to an existing issue (if applicable)

---

## Related Issue
Reference the issue number if this PR fixes or relates to one.  
*Example: #12*

---

## Additional Notes
Any extra information or context about your changes.
